title: How does Bill Gates protect himself from getting his smartphone and computers hacked? - Quora

response.answer_text: As anyone else would do. Be secure, vigilant. On the internet, we get equality. Yes, Mr.Gates is a little different case as he has gathered much info about other fellow users and have easy access to Microsoft internal systems. Still, he can be hacked. Why not? There are security bugs which are unknown and remain unknown for much time until they are exposed by some researcher. Those bugs and bite anyone and intrude their security. Everything gets better with time, this also implies everything was worse before current time so everything is worse than it would be in future. If there are vulnerability Crackers (Bad Hackers) are there to take advantage of it and hack Bill Gates or anyone.
By using extreme security measures that a normal person cannot afford. He is using technologies which are best. A team of programmers to build security softwares and much more.
